title: The Admin Wing
visuals: ASCII_Overlay: A complex node-map of the network appears. Text streams on the side.
lighting: Flickering fluorescent tubes. Green terminal glow. Emergency lighting.
audio: Humming servers, cooling fans, the click of old keyboards, distant alarms.
smell: Ozone, dust, old plastic, stale recycled air.
narrative: Jax jacks into the door panel. 'Cover me. This code is... archaic.' While he works, the main terminal flickers to life.
gmNotes: This is the revelation scene. The terminal puzzle reveals Jax's true identity and his role in the massacre.

npcs.name: Jaxson 'Jax' V.
npcs.notes: Hacking the door. Cannot see what player finds on terminal.
npcs.motivation: Get to Elena before his heart gives out. He's running out of time.
npcs.personality: Focused, sweating, hands shaking. Won't look at the terminal.

challenges.description: Bypass the ICE protecting the archived log files.

success_effect.text: Access granted. The file structure unfolds before you. Decades of secrets laid bare.

failure_effect.text: The system locks down. You trigger a silent alarm. Somewhere in the building, something stirs.

challenges.description: If you have Jax's maintenance chip, read its data logs.

success_effect.text: The chip contains User 89's access logs. 'Ventilation reversal authorized.' The timestamp is 15 years ago. The day of the massacre.

failure_effect.text: The chip's data is corrupted. You can only make out fragments.

terminal_access_points.name: Admin Workstation
terminal_access_points.description: A dusty Bio-Dyne workstation. The screen flickers with 15-year-old data.

triggers.label: Confront Jax
triggers.text: You can show Jax what you found. His face goes pale. 'I... I didn't know. I was fifteen. They said they were just going to clear the building...'
